doc:
Joe Howard (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Howard_(actor) 0 Joe Howard (born November 24, 1948) is an American actor known for his role as George Frankly on Square One TV's Mathnet. Beyond seven years as George Frankly, a role for which he beat out Phil Hartman, he has a long career as a character actor. He is otherwise best known for his roles in Grumpy Old Men and The World's Fastest Indian. Howard has also had a long career on stage. He is the father of actor Jeremy Howard. Joe_Howard ( born November_24 , 1948 ) is an_American_actor known for his_role as George_Frankly on Square_One_TV 's_Mathnet . Beyond seven_years as George_Frankly , a_role for which he beat out_Phil_Hartman , he has a_long_career as a_character_actor . He is_otherwise_best_known for his_roles in Grumpy_Old_Men and The_World 's_Fastest_Indian . Howard has_also_had a_long_career on stage . He is the_father of actor_Jeremy_Howard .
